translations.seo_offerings_prematch: Predicted lineups are available for the match a few days in advance while the actual lineup will be available about an hour ahead of the match.
translations.seo_play_offs_explanation: The play-off matchups are determined by a draw. In each grouping, the two teams on the left are drawn against the two teams on the right to create two play-off matchups. The play-offs are played over two legs, with the winner going to the round of 16.\n\nThere is a separate draw for the round of 16 using the same process.
translations.seo_playing_home_at_stadium: %1$@ is playing home against %2$@ at %3$@ on %4$@.
translations.seo_predict_onboarding_apps: Predict %@ results and compete against friends in leagues!
translations.seo_site_description: FotMob is the essential app for matchday. Get live scores, fixtures, tables, match stats, and personalised news from over 500 football leagues around the world.
translations.seo_site_description_aboutus_careers: We are looking for developers, check out our open positions! FotMob is the essential app for matchday. Get live scores, fixtures, tables, match stats, and personalised news from over 500 football leagues around the world.
translations.seo_site_description_faq: Have a question about FotMob, app settings or stats definitions? Check out FotMob's Frequently Asked Questions page for answers and other pro tips!
translations.seo_site_description_for_you: Create a personalized news feed with breaking news from your favorite clubs and leagues.

translations.seo_site_description_match: %1$@ vs %2$@ on %3$@. Check live results, H2H, match stats, lineups, player ratings, insights, team forms, shotmap, and highlights.

translations.seo_site_description_team_table: %1$@ - league and cup standings and form guide
translations.seo_site_description_team_transfers: Latest %1$@ transfers in, out and contract extensions
translations.seo_site_description_transfer_center: Find all latest confirmed transfers & most expensive signings. FotMob Transfer Center - filter by league & teams. Stay updated on transfers with live updates on deadline day with all completed deals!
translations.seo_site_description_transfer_center_sel: %1$@ latest confirmed transfers & most expensive signings. FotMob Transfer Center - filter by league & teams. Stay updated on transfers with live updates on deadline day with all completed deals!
